revision.text:
<!--음반_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Album
| mappings =	
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 가수명 | ontologyProperty = artist }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음반명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발매년월일 | ontologyProperty = releaseDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음반종류 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 녹음 | ontologyProperty = recordDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 녹음 | ontologyProperty = recordedIn }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장르 | ontologyProperty = genre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 길이 | ontologyProperty = runtime | unit = minute }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 레이블 | ontologyProperty = recordLabel }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 프로듀서 | ontologyProperty = producer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 평가 | ontologyProperty = review }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 전앨범 | ontologyProperty = previousWork }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 후앨범 | ontologyProperty = subsequentWork }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 포맷 | ontologyProperty = format }}
end}}
 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 전앨범발매 = 
| 현앨범발매 = 
| 후앨범발매 = 
-->
